items.sentence: I think Tom would go to Boston with you if you asked him to.
Tom said that I didn't speak French well enough for the job.
I suspect that Tom and Mary have already left for Australia.
I'm not the one who told Tom that he needed to study French.
What made you think I was going to go to Australia with Tom?
I think that Tom can speak French. I could be wrong, though.
I thought that you said that you wanted to do that with Tom.
I thought that it was really nice of you to do that for Tom.
Tom thought that he was better at French than he really was.
No one else could find Tom, but I knew exactly where he was.
